title: Replace company logo image in Hero section

requirements.summary: Replace the company logo image in the Hero section with a new J M Construction logo
acceptanceCriteria: The new logo image replaces the existing image element at the specified XPath location
The logo maintains appropriate dimensions and styling consistent with the Hero section design
The logo is clearly visible against the Hero section background

file_operations.description: Replace the existing company logo image source with the new generated logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/jm-logo.dim_200x200.png. Update the img element's src attribute to reference the new logo file while maintaining existing className, alt text, and other attributes. Ensure the logo dimensions and styling remain consistent with the Hero section design and that it is clearly visible against the background.
